page.description: Returns true is the string value is a valid datetime.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Indicates that the Time_String can be interpreted as a valid time. .F. = Time_String can not be interpreted as a valid time.

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A character representation of a time value.

page.discussion: The ISTIME() function returns .T. if the Time_String is a valid representation of a time value. Note : A Time value includes a date component.
